schools.name: University of Science and Technology of Southern Philippines
schools.description: USTP has different campuses consisting of Alubijid, CDO, Claveria, and many more. The university offers various courses, including BS in Information Technology and BS in Technology Communication and Management.

topics.topicdescription: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language. Developers use Java to construct applications in laptops, data centres, game consoles, scientific supercomputers, cell phones, and other devices.
topics.littleinformation: Learning Java for application development.

topics.topicdescription: Python is a high-level, versatile programming language known for readability and simplicity, facilitating rapid development across various domains.
topics.littleinformation: Exploring Python for versatile programming.

courses.course: BS in Technology Communication and Management

topics.topicdescription: Understanding communication protocols is crucial in networking. It involves the rules and conventions for communication between network devices.

topics.topicdescription: Developing strategic leadership skills for managing teams in the rapidly evolving digital age.

schools.name: Capitol University
schools.description: Capitol University is a non-sectarian, co-educational private university located in Cagayan de Oro, Philippines. The university offers courses such as Bachelor of Elementary Education and Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering.

schools.name: Cagayan de Oro College
schools.description: Cagayan de Oro College is a private non-sectarian college on Max Suniel St, Carmen, Cagayan de Oro, Philippines. The college offers courses such as BS in Criminology and BS in Nursing.

schools.name: Xavier University - Ateneo de Cagayan
schools.description: Xavier University is a private Catholic university run by the Society of Jesus in Cagayan de Oro City. The university offers a wide range of programs, including BS in Computer Science and BS in Environmental Science.

schools.name: Liceo de Cagayan University
schools.description: The Liceo de Cagayan University (LDCU) is a private non-sectarian basic and higher education institution in Cagayan de Oro, Philippines. It was founded in 1955 by Rodolfo N. Pelaez of Cagayan de Oro and his wife Elsa P. Pelaez of Cebu City.

schools.name: Lourdes College
schools.description: Lourdes College Cagayan de Oro City is a private, Roman Catholic basic and higher education institution managed by the Congregation of the Religious of the Virgin Mary in Cagayan de Oro City, Misamis Oriental, Philippines.
